reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun, Sparkly & great for a wedding-wearing!
reviews.reviewText: Fun, Sparkly & great for a wedding-wearing...also fits nicely over a N95 for ultimate protection. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really did like this mask very cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Safety Third I Always Say.
reviews.reviewText: I love this mask. I had to adjust a bit to make sure the nose part was actually on my nose. It looks so beautiful on. But whenever I talked and breathed in I would suck in the mask which was a bit annoying. I’m not sure it’s protecting against anything but I got Vaxed so I felt safe wearing it. I also ended up doubling it with a throwaway surgical mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest mask, great coverage and comfortable too..Received a lot of compliments….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little fog on the glasses
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these simply to look more festive for the holidays but was really impressed with the fit and feel of them. I found myself without a mask at the gym (stupid covid 15) so I used one of these out of necessity. It was running day so I was definitely huffing and puffing. For once, I didn't have to constantly pull my mask away to clear up the glasses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Do NOT wear makeup in this mask!!!
reviews.reviewText: I wore this for my senior prom and of course I had makeup on. I washed it twice and makeup never came out. Other than that, it’s a pretty good mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for holiday season
